attributes.additional_details: These people are being forced from their homes by the Russian invasion and we should be doing more to help them. Poland has opened its borders, but we must do our part and ease the burden on the neighbouring countries who are displaying great compassion.
attributes.background: Give Ukrainian refugees sanctuary in the UK as they flee from the Russian invasion.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
